MeldPlugin

class MeldPlugin extends BasePlugin (View source)

The main Meld plugin file.

Properties

static Container; $container
protected $config

Methods

__construct()

Constructor. Loads the config file containing the plugin information.

initializeAutoloader()

Initialises the autoloader.

initializeContainer()

Initialises the dependency-injection container.

loadConfig()

Loads the plugin configuration details from the config file.

string
getName()

Returns the plugin name.

string
getDescription()

Returns the plugin description.

string
getVersion()

Returns the plugin’s version number.

string
getDeveloper()

Returns the plugin developer’s name.

string
getDeveloperUrl()

Returns the plugin developer’s URL.

string
getDocumentationUrl()

Returns the documentation URL.

string
getReleaseFeedUrl()

Returns the "releases" URL.

string
getSchemaVersion()

Returns a faux schema version, so Craft doesn't attempt to run database updates when the plugin version changes.

bool
hasSettings()

Returns a boolean indicating whether the plugin has settings.

bool
hasCpSection()

Returns a boolean indicating whether the plugin has it's own control panel section.

MeldTwigExtension
addTwigExtension()

Registers the Twig extension.

Details

at line 37
__construct()

Constructor. Loads the config file containing the plugin information.

We can't do this from the init method, because Craft calls getName, getVersion, and so forth before running the init method.
